import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Clapperboard, Code, Film, User, Mail, Phone, MapPin, Download, Globe, Play, X } from 'lucide-react'; import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'; import { Dialog, DialogContent, DialogDescription, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogTrigger, } from "./components/ui/dialog"; const App = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('compositing'); const NavItem = ({ id, icon: Icon, label }) => ( setActiveSection(id)} className={`w-full flex items-center px-4 py-3 rounded-lg transition-all duration-200 hover:bg-gray-100 ${ activeSection === id ? 'bg-base-black text-white hover:bg-base-900' : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-base-black' }`} > {label} ); const VideoPlayer = ({ src }) => (
); const ProjectCard = ({ title, description, duration, detailedContent, videoUrl }) => (

); const sections = [ { id: 'compositing', icon: Clapperboard, label: 'Compositing' }, { id: 'technical', icon: Code, label: 'Technical' }, { id: 'motion', icon: Film, label: 'Motion' }, { id: 'personal', icon: User, label: 'Personal' } ]; const ContactInfo = ({ icon: Icon, text, href }) => ( {text} ); const renderContent = () => { const content = { compositing: (

VFX & Compositing

Experienced Nuke Compositor with 3 years of expertise in creating seamless visual effects. Currently working at Incognito studio s.r.o. on feature films and commercial projects.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Integration of 2D and 3D elements
  • Compositing of complex visual effects
  • Color grading and final touches
} />

Selected Projects:

  • Panasonic Japan - Product visualization
  • Moneta Bank - Environmental effects
  • McDonald's - Brand integration
} />

Project Details:

  • Created dynamic visual sequences
  • Integrated motion graphics
  • Real-time rendering optimization
} /> ), technical: (

Technical Skills

Proficient in industry-standard VFX software and programming languages for pipeline development.

Development Focus:

  • Python scripting for automation
  • Custom node development
  • Pipeline integration tools
  • Workflow optimization scripts
} />

Key Tools:

  • Automated render submission system
  • Asset management database
  • Quality control automation
  • Version control integration
} />

Responsibilities:

  • Workflow design and implementation
  • Technical documentation
  • Team training and support
  • Performance optimization
} /> ), personal: (

Personal Projects

Passionate about experimental animation and the fusion of analog and digital media.

A collection of experimental animations exploring:

  • Procedural animation techniques
  • Generative art principles
  • Mixed media integration
} />

Project Focus:

  • Alternative processing methods
  • Digital-analog hybrid techniques
  • Texture and grain studies
} />

Techniques Explored:

  • Data manipulation
  • Signal processing
  • Digital artifacts as art
} /> ), }; return ( {content[activeSection]} ); }; return (

Martin Tomek

Motion Designer & VFX Artist

{sections.map((section) => ( ))}

Available for new opportunities

Willing to relocate to Canary Islands

{renderContent()}
); }; export default App;
